• Nausea or vomiting.
• Diarrhoea.
Pain relief in labour
For most women labour is 
painful, so it is important to 
learn about all the ways you 
can relieve pain. Whoever is 
going to be with you during 
labour should also know about 
the	different	options,	as	well	
as how they can support you. 
Ask your midwife or doctor
